Key Match Events: Jasprit Bumrah led from the front and bagged the Player of the Match award as Team India won the first IREvIND T20I by 2 runs via DLS.
Jasprit Bumrah took two wickets in his first over on his comeback.
Prasidh Krishna, on T20 debut, took two wickets, those of George Dockrell and Harry Tector.
Ravi Bishnoi bowled sublimely for figures of 4-0-23-2.
India won the match by two runs on DLS after rain interrupted play.
Pre-Game Insights: Jasprit Bumrah might have sounded relaxed in the pre-match press conference, but deep inside, his mind might have been restless and anxious to test himself out in a competitive setting.
Post-Match Reflections: The crowd applauded and Bumrah smiled a satisfied smile. He might not have reached his most destructive zone yet, but he showed signs of promise that he is hovering in the vicinity of that space.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Rain interrupted play, reducing the game to 20 overs per side.
